name: Light_Torrent
display_help: Unleashes a cone of light that knocks foes back.

name: Subdue
display_help: Subdue deals moderate Psionic damage and may leave the targeted foe Immobilized for a brief time. Immobilized foes cannot move but can still attack. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

name: Psychic_Scream
display_help: This howl of Psionic energy resonates in the minds of all foes within its conical area of effect, inflicting moderate damage. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

name: Telekinetic_Blast
display_help: You can use Telekinesis to Blast a targeted foe with the power of your mind. This attack deals Smashing and Psionic damage, and can knock your opponent back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

name: Will_Domination
display_help: This powerful attack deals Psionic damage, and is so painful it usually renders its target unconscious. The victim is asleep, and will wake if disturbed. Damage: Superior, Recharge: Slow

name: Psychic_Wail
display_help: Psychic Wail is a devastating Psionic attack that wracks the minds of all nearby foes. Those that survive will have a severely reduced attack rate and may be left Disoriented. This power leaves you drained of Endurance and unable to recover Endurance for
display_short_help: Close (AoE), Extreme DMG(Psionic), Foe Disorient -Recharge, Self -Recovery

name: Scramble_Thoughts
display_help: Painfully scrambles the synapses of a targeted foe, leaving him dramatically Disoriented for a short duration. Deals a little Psionic Damage. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

name: Light_Explosion
display_help: Hurls a blast of charged light that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target.

name: Resistance
display_help: Archvillain resistance.

name: Fly
display_help: Aurora Borealis can Fly!

name: Fly_fx
display_help: Special

name: Demon_Summoning
display_help: Summons 1 to 3 Demons to a targeted location.

name: Resistance
display_help: Infernal is resistant to lethal, smashing, energy, fire and cold damage.
display_short_help: Auto Res Lethal, Smash, Fire, Cold, Energy, Negative Energy, Toxic, Radiation

name: Demon_Summoning
display_help: Summons 1 to 3 Demons to a targeted location.

name: Liberty_Belt
display_help: Ms. Liberty can invoke the power of the Liberty Belt to make her an undeniable force to be reckoned with.
display_short_help: Self, +Res(Disorient, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, All DMG), +DMG, +ACC

name: Nova
display_help: You can explode in a tremendous blast of energy, sending nearby foes flying. The Nova deals massive damage to all nearby foes, although the damage does vary. Activating this power leaves you drained of Endurance, and unable to recover any Endurance for a while. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Very Long
display_short_help: PBAoE, Extreme DMG(Energy/Smash), Foe Knockback, Self -Recovery

name: EM_Pulse
display_help: You are Held by the EMP Pulse and your Regeneration Rate is reduced.

name: Total_Focus
display_help: Total Focus is complete mastery over Energy Melee. This is a very slow, but incredibly devastating attack that can knock out most opponents, leaving them Disoriented. Due to the exhausting nature of Total Focus, recharge time is very long. Damage: Extreme, Recharge: Long

name: Power_Bolt
display_help: A quick attack that rapidly hurls small bolts of energy at foes, sometimes knocking them down. Fast, but little damage.

name: Power_Blast
display_help: A much more powerful, yet slower version of Power Bolt. Power Blast sends a focused beam of energy at a foe that can knock him back.

name: Energy_Torrent
display_help: Unleashes a cone of energy that knocks foes back.

name: Power_Burst
display_help: A short range, but devastating attack. Damage: Heavy, Recharge: Slow

name: Power_Thrust
display_help: A focused attack that violently shoves the target and sends him flying. Deals minimal damage, but can be very effective. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Moderate

name: Explosive_Blast
display_help: Hurls a blast of charged energy that violently explodes on impact, damaging all foes near the target.

name: Energy_Punch
display_help: An Energy Punch from the Hero has Disoriented you.

name: Bone_Smasher
display_help: You have been Disoriented.

name: Whirling_Hands
display_help: A Whirling Hands attack from the Hero has Disoriented you.

name: Resistance
display_help: Archvillain resistance.

name: Fly
display_help: Luminary can Fly!

name: Fly_fx
display_help: Special

name: Spectral_Wounds
display_help: Spectral Wounds convinces the target that he has taken severe damage. The illusion is so convincing that the victim can fall from the Spectral Wounds. However, the damage is not real, and if the victim survives long enough, the illusion will fade and some of the wounds will heal. Damage: High(Illusionary), Recharge: Moderate

name: Blind
display_help: Painfully Blinds a single targeted foe so severely that he is rendered helpless. Blind is so bright that additional foes may also be blinded, though they will not take any damage, and attacking them will free them from the effects. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate
display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), Moderate DMG(Psionic), Foe Hold/Sleep

name: Deceive
display_help: You can Deceive an enemy into believing his friends are not who they appear to be. If successful, the enemy will ignore you and attack his own allies. If you Deceive someone before they have noticed you, your presence will continue to be masked. You will not receive any Experience Points for foes defeated by a Deceived enemy. Recharge: Moderate

name: Flash
display_help: Generates a brilliant flash of light around you that blinds nearby foes. Flashed foes are rendered helpless and unable to defend themselves. Recharge: Very Long

name: Spectral_Army
display_help: You can fabricate 2 to 4 Phantom heroes around a targeted foe. These Phantoms are not real, and are indestructible. Their attacks are similar to Spectral Wounds. Though they deal damage, it is illusory and will heal if the victim survives long enough. Phantoms are short lived and cannot be buffed or healed. Recharge: Very Long
display_short_help: Summon Spectral Army: Ranged Minor DMG(Energy/Special)

name: Spectral_Terror
display_help: You can create an illusion of unspeakable Terror. The manifestation is so horrible that it caused most foes to tremble helplessly in terror. The Spectral Terror may also Terrify individual foes, causing them to run away in panic. Recharge: Slow

name: Spectral_Servant
display_help: You can construct a powerful entity composed of pure light. Although made of light, the Phantasm is tangible and has powerful Energy attacks. The Phantasm can also fly and summon duplicates of itself. The duplicates are intangible, and cannot be harmed. The duplicates' attacks deal illusory damage similar to that dealt by Spectral Wounds. Only the original Phantasm can be healed and buffed. Recharge: Very Long
display_short_help: Summon Spectral Servant: Ranged Moderate DAM (Energy)

name: Transfusion
display_help: Transfusion drains an enemy of some Endurance and reduces the target's Regeneration rate, and transfers that energy, in the form of Hit Points, to all allies near the affected foe. You can use Transfusion to heal yourself as well as your allies. Recharge: Moderate

name: Siphon_Power
display_help: The Hero has Siphoned your power and reduced your damage potential to strengthen his own.

name: Tenebrous_Tentacles
display_help: Tenebrous Tentacles have Immobilized you, reducing your Accuracy, and crushing you for Smashing Damage over Time.

name: Night_Fall
display_help: Unleashes a cone shaped burst of particles from the Netherworld. All targets within the modest range of this power take Negative Energy damage and have a reduced Accuracy. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Slow

name: Torrent
display_help: The Torrent has reduced your Accuracy.

name: Resistance
display_help: Archvillain resistance.

name: Thunder_Kick
display_help: You are Disoriented

name: Storm_Kick
display_help: Unleashes a flurry of quick kicks to pummel your foe.

name: Cobra_Strike
display_help: Using intense martial arts focus, you can perform a Cobra Strike that deals minor damage, but has a great chance of Disorienting your target. Damage: Minor, Recharge: Slow

name: Crane_Kick
display_help: A slow, high damage kick that can send your target flying!

name: Crippling_Axe_Kick
display_help: You are Immobilized and your movement speed is reduced.

name: Eagles_Claw
display_help: You have been Disoriented.

name: Temp_Invulnerability
display_help: When you activate this power, you become highly resistant to Smashing and Lethal damage for a short duration. Recharge: Very Long

name: Dull_Pain
display_help: You can activate this power to increase his maximum Hit Points for a short time.

name: Unstoppable
display_help: When you activate this power, you not only become extremely resistant to most damage, but also to Disorient, Immobilization, Hold, and Sleep effects. Endurance recovery is also increased. Unstoppable costs little Endurance to activate, but when it wears o
display_short_help: Self, +Res(Disorient, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, All DMG but Psionics)

name: Lightning_Bolt
display_help: You can send a large blast of electrical energy at a foe. Lightning bolt deals good damage and also drains some Endurance.

name: Thunder_Strike
display_help: You have been Disoriented.

name: Super_Leap
display_help: You can jump real high.

display_help: Archvillain resistance.

name: Liberty_Belt
display_help: Ms. Liberty can invoke the power of the Liberty Belt to make her an undeniable force to be reckoned with.
display_short_help: Self, +Res(Disorient, Sleep, Hold, Immobilize, All DMG), +DMG, +ACC

name: Eviscerate
display_help: Bobcat spins and slashes around violently, attacking all nearby foes in a wide arc in front of him. Eviscerate is so deadly, that there is a chance of dealing extra damage!
display_short_help: Melee Cone Lethal, Very High DMG, Special

name: Quickness
display_help: Your Quick reflexes allow you to move faster than normal, as well as resist slow effects. This power is always on and permanently increases your attack rate and movement speed.

name: Elude
display_help: You can improve your reflexes, making yourself so quick you can Elude almost any attack, be it ranged, melee, or area effect. Your running speed and jumping height are also increased.

name: Strike
display_help: Claw Strike is a standard claw attack against a targeted foe.

name: Slash
display_help: Mynx has reduced your defense with her Claw Slash.

name: Spin
display_help: Mynx spins around with claws extended, slicing up all the nearby enemies.

name: Follow_Up
display_help: You perform a feint attack that deals moderate damage. After this attack hits, it gives you a large bonus to Accuracy and damage for a brief time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

name: Focus
display_help: Mynx can project a burst of focused power. Focus only travels a short distance, but it can also knock down foes.

name: Shockwave
display_help: Projects a Shockwave of focused power that can travel a short distance. Shockwave travels in a wide arc in front of you dealing moderate damage and, possibly knocking down foes. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

name: Focused_Fighting
display_help: You become more evasive to melee, ranged and area of effect attacks. Your Focus also offers you resistance to Confuse effects and allows you to perceive stealthy foes.

name: Feral_Flurry
display_help: Unleashes a super fast Flurry of claws to slash your foe.

name: Super_Leap
display_help: Mynx can jump real high.

name: Decoy
display_help: The Decoy is an illusion, and is intangible.

name: Shadow_Punch
display_help: Shadow Punch reduces your Accuracy.

name: Smite
display_help: Smite reduces your Accuracy.

name: Dark_Blast
display_help: Dark Blast reduces your Accuracy.

name: Shadow_Punch
display_help: Shadow Punch reduces your Accuracy.

name: Smite
display_help: Smite reduces your Accuracy.

name: Life_Drain
display_help: Life Drain reduces your Accuracy.

name: Dark_Blast
display_help: Dark Blast reduces your Accuracy.

name: Gloom
display_help: Gloom reduces your Accuracy.

name: Tenebrous_Tentacles
display_help: Tenebrous Tentacles have Immobilized you, reducing your Accuracy, and crushing you for Smashing Damage over Time.

name: Resistance
display_help: The Phantasm is resistant to Lethal and Energy damage, but vulnerable to Negative Energy.

name: DecoyPhantasm
display_help: Manifests a Decoy Phantasm to distract foes. The Decoy is not real, and cannot harm or be harmed. However, your foes will believe the Decoy is a threat and attack it.

name: Fly
display_help: Phantasms can Fly!

name: Fly_fx
display_help: fx only

name: Translucency
display_help: Spectral Servant Decoys are intangible.

name: Shadow_Punch
display_help: Shadow Punch reduces your Accuracy.

name: Smite
display_help: Smite reduces your Accuracy.

name: Dark_Blast
display_help: Dark Blast reduces your Accuracy.

name: Fly
display_help: Spectral Servant Decoy can Fly!

name: Fly_fx
display_help: fx only

name: Subdue
display_help: Subdue deals moderate Psionic damage and may leave the targeted foe Immobilized for a brief time. Immobilized foes cannot move but can still attack. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

name: Psionic_Lance
display_help: The Psionic Lance has reduced your Attack rate.

name: Psychic_Scream
display_help: The Psychic Scream has reduced your Attack rate.

name: Telekinetic_Blast
display_help: You can use Telekinesis to Blast a targeted foe with the power of your mind. This attack deals Smashing and Psionic damage, and can knock your opponent back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

name: Will_Domination
display_help: Your will has been Dominated.

name: Scramble_Thoughts
display_help: You have been Disoriented.

name: Repel
display_help: Repel creates a zone of kinetic energy that violently repels nearby foes. Each villain that is repelled costs additional Endurance. Recharge: Slow

name: Siphon_Power
display_help: The Hero has Siphoned your power and reduced your damage potential to strengthen his own.

name: Siphon_Speed
display_help: The Hero has Siphoned your speed and reduced your damage potential to increase its own.

name: Fulcrum_Shift
display_help: Fulcrum Shift drains the power of a targeted foe and all foes nearby, transferring it to all adjacent allies, the caster, and those near the caster. Affected foes will deal less damage, while your affected allies will deal more. The more foes that are affected, the more power your allies receive. Fulcrum Shift can dramatically turn the tide of a melee battle. Recharge: Long

name: Psychic_Shockwave
display_help: Psychic Shockwave is a devastating Psionic attack that wracks the minds of all nearby foes. Affected foes may have a reduced attack rate and may be left Disoriented. Damage: High Recharge: Slow

name: Resistance
display_help: Archvillain resistance.

name: Fly
display_help: Swan can Fly!

name: Fly_fx
display_help: Special

name: Flying_Swords
display_help: Valkyrie has lowered your defense with her Broad Sword.

name: Whirling_Sword
display_help: Valkyrie has lowered your defense with her Broad Sword.

name: Disembowel
display_help: Valkyrie has lowered your defense with her Broad Sword.

name: Head_Splitter
display_help: Valkyrie has lowered your defense with her Broad Sword.

name: Rise_of_the_Valkyrie
display_help: Should you fall in battle, you can Revive yourself from the brink of death. You will revive with most of your Hit Points and half your Endurance and be protected from XP Debt for 20 seconds. Recharge: Very Long

name: Exploding_Spear
display_help: You fire a grenade-tipped spear at long range. This explosion affects all within the blast radius, and can knock them back. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

name: Hack
display_help: Valkyrie has lowered your defense with her Broad Sword.

name: Slash
display_help: Valkyrie has lowered your defense with her Broad Sword.

name: Slice
display_help: Valkyrie has lowered your defense with her Broad Sword.

name: Parry
display_help: Valkyrie has lowered your defense with her Broad Sword.

name: Resistance
display_help: Archvillain resistance.

name: Moment_of_Glory
display_help: When you activate this power, you lose almost all of your Hit Points and can no longer Regenerate Hit Points, However, you gain Resistant and Defense to all damage types except Psionics, recover Endurance more quickly, and are highly resistant to Sleep, Disorient, Immobilization, and Hold effects. After Moment of Glory wares off, you will not be able to Regenerate Hit Points for a short while. Recharge: Very Long
display_short_help: Self +Res(All DMG but Psionics), +DEF(All DMG but Psionics), +Recovery, -HP

name: Resistance
display_help: Archvillain resistance.

name: Entangle
display_help: Immobilizes your target by Entangling their feet in a twisted mass of thorny roots. The roots do smashing and lethal damage to the target over time. More resilient foes may require multiple applications to Immobilize. Entangle can immobilize flying targets, if they are near the ground when attacked. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Fast
display_short_help: Ranged, Moderate DoT(Smashing, Lethal), Foe Immobilize

name: Strangler
display_help: Holds a distant foe by Strangling him with massive root-like vines. The target is held helpless, while he is slowly crushed by the vines. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Moderate

name: Roots
display_help: Immobilizes a group of foes by entangling their feet in a twisted mass of thorny Roots. Roots is slower and does less damage than Entangle, but it can capture multiple foes in one attack. Like Entangle, Roots can immobilize flying targets, if they are near the ground when attacked. Damage: Moderate(DoT), Recharge: Fast
display_short_help: Ranged (Targeted AoE), DoT(Smashing, Lethal), Foe Immobilize

name: Spore_Burst
display_help: You hurl a large fungi pod at your foes. This pod is full of Spores that burst on impact, engulfing the target and all those around him. All affected targets may succumb to the narcotic effect of the Spores and will fall asleep. The targets will remain asleep for some time, but will awaken if attacked. Recharge: Slow

name: Spirit_Tree
display_help: You can tap into the elusive and powerful energy of the World Tree and extract a Spirit Tree at a targeted location. The Sprit Tree is immobile, but possesses incredible regenerative powers. The Regeneration Rate of you, or your allies, will be greatly increased as long as you are near the Spirit Tree. Recharge: Very Long

name: Vines
display_help: Creates a field of Strangler Vines that can Hold multiple foes at range. The affected targets are held helpless by the massive root-like vines. Unlike the power Strangler, this power does not deal any damage, but it can Hold multiple foes at once. Recharge: Moderate

name: Seeds_of_Confusion
display_help: You throw a handful of seeds from a rare Baffle plant at your foes. The seeds spread out in a wide cone and release a dusty chaff that contain a number of alkaloids and hallucinogenic compounds. Foes that come into contact with these seeds become violently confused and will turn and attack each other, ignoring you and all your allies. You will not receive any Experience Points for foes defeated entirely by Confused enemies. Recharge: Very Long

name: Propel_Boulder
display_help: You are able to tear up a chunk of ground beneath your feet and Hurl it at an enemy. This attack is deals moderate damage, and can knock foes back and even drop them out of the air if they are flying. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

name: Stump_Toss
display_help: You are able to tear up a chunk of ground beneath your feet and Hurl it at an enemy. This attack is deals moderate damage, and can knock foes back and even drop them out of the air if they are flying. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

name: Tuatha_Horde
display_help: Woodsman can summon a horde of Tuatha.

name: Resistance
display_help: Auto Res Lethal Disorient
